website_summaries.verdict: Even if you don't expect much from your toaster, you can do better than this.
pros: The Hamilton Beach Classic Chrome Toaster did an acceptable job in our tests, showing no major weaknesses
As cheap toasters go, it's one that gets the job done
cons: The Classic Chrome tended to overcook slightly at medium settings
Also, the design left us unimpressed

customer_reviews.title: Nice little toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Hamilton beach classic chrome is a nice little toaster at a good price. Looks nice. Works nice and is compact in size. Bagel setting toasts one side, the flat sides of bagel. In front of the slots, there is a picture that shows which way the bagel should be placed. Toast setting has many settings and toasts just right. Crumb tray is large and easy to access. The Hamilton Beach toaster is replacing a VERY expensive name brand toaster that worked for only a few years with very light usage and it burned everything...no matter the setting, so for such s small price I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: YaYaDawn

customer_reviews.title: Not As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar toaster made by GE that I've had for 12 years that out performs this Hamilton Beach one from day one. First thing I noticed is the crumb tray is on the back side and not under the dial as pictured on one of the photos. A bit of an inconvenience just because of how it sits on my counter. Second the slots aren't deep enough for a larger slice of bread such as sourdough. Only 2/3 of it gets toasted, if you turn the slice around it gets burnt. I purchased this thinking I'd use the older one in my camper and the new one at home. Nope, keeping the old one for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: dlms

customer_reviews.title: More, much more than we expected! And wonderful quality to boot!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toaster. When I first mentioned to my mom that I got her a toaster (after weeks of hearing that her's had broken) she was a little hesitant. She wanted certain features that she wasn't sure she could get in a little inexpensive toaster that I could get on Amazon. Boy was she surprised! And I was delighted! My choice was given a two thumbs up and we are happy toaster eaters once again. So, now it's December 2019 and our perfect little toaster is still going strong. Holding up to all our use and really nice. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Maniscalco

customer_reviews.title: A Sign of the Times
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm 69 years old. In my lifetime I've probably needed only 3-4 toasters. This one looks nice sitting on the counter. But as far as toasting goes... don't expect results like older toasters gave. I can't say how long it will last. What I can say is how long it 'feels' like it will last. The mechanisms, buttons, pop-up function, etc. all feel like they were made to last 3-6 months. A fine example of modern-day cheaply made products that are sold on looks alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my old Hamilton Beach toaster that lasted 10+ years. I loved that toaster but this newer model isn't even close to the same high quality. It doesn't toast evenly at all no matter what setting I try. It also feels cheaply made, like it could break at any time. For me this was a waste of $28, so you might want to save your money and pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Terri C

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Jaw Dropping - But Functional
customer_reviews.text: It sure looks nice, but it's pretty light weight. It toasts a bit uneven. I do like the defrost feature. It puts a light toast on the bread. It was a low price so I got what I paid for . *EDITED*... been using this toaster for 10 days...and now it's only toasting half the bread.. LOL. OY!! RETURNED. BARGAIN PRICE but I expected it to last more then 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Highmtn

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had to give this toaster 1 star based on the fact that I've tried it 4 different times and all it does is burn the bottom, the rest of the bread isn't touched. This was literally on the lowest heat setting. I could see smoke coming out of it. I am very upset because this isn't necessarily a cheap toaster, and mine's completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lee Howard

customer_reviews.title: Liked it, but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I like the features of this toaster, but I am disappointed in its longevity. I've had it about two years, and use it maybe 4-5 times per week to toast basic sliced bread (frozen) or a bagel. The outer heating coils stopped working, so basically I now get 1 side of the bread toasted while the other remains soft and a little soggy. Admittedly, it wasn't very expensive. However, I think I will try a different brand to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: HuskyFan

customer_reviews.title: It works, but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Got this toaster a couple weeks ago to replace our old one hat stopped working. As a family of 5, we use our toaster almost daily. Waffles, toast, bagels, you name it. This is a reasonably priced brand name toaster so I gave it a shot. It’s clunky and loud when you pop the toast up. One side of the toast is always darker than the other so I flip it over and toast it again. Not ideal on rushed school/work mornings. Next time I’ll probably spend a few dollars more and get a different one. We will continue to use this one but it seems a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy77

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: I bought in summer 2017. It is broken in the fall of 2018. After a few months, the press starts to work poorly. It seems a mechanical issue. Sometimes you need to press firmly to be sure. This gives me a bad impression. More worse, the heating in the middle was lost and you can't toast both sides. I got annoyed and stop to use. Notice that they just have one-year-waranty. They don't provide shipping service for repair even if this product has deficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lever Doesn’t Stay Down to Toast
customer_reviews.text: I used this toaster at two different homes. When I got home I bought one, but it doesn’t toast as well as the other two. It toasts unevenly. Periodically, when we push the lever to begin the toasting process it didn’t stay down. Now it is getting worse. I have looked online for troubleshooting and even at the manual, as well as the website. There are no resolutions except for to clean it which we did and it still does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great basic and efficient toaster
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old (15+ years) toaster and didn't realize just how slow and inefficient that thing was until this arrived. It is very fast and very compact. I really like that it doesn't crowd my counter top very much. It toasts bread and bagels so quickly. It is a great toaster for the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Meghana Raja

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is not worth buying its made cheap very poor quality and for the money I spend it's not worth it. I love Hamilton toasters the previous one I owned lasted 12 years but this one is made definitely poor quality smaller and the crumb slider is in the back instead of the front also has a smaller cord. Very unsatisfied with this Hamiton toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Confusing settings
customer_reviews.text: Had several months and a long conversation with Hamilton Beach regarding the toaster burning our bread. Turns out the picture of a piece of bread on the darkest setting is confusing and doesn't make sense. We finally figured out to Follow the size of the dots for our setting vs the picture or the breads!
customer_reviews.author: Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price range!
customer_reviews.text: Love the retro styling of this toaster, The bagel setting is a nice feature and I really like the reheat button I use it often as I get distracted while prepping breakfast and forget about my toast! You cant really butter something properly that is cold. Have had this for a few months using everyday and its performing like a champ! Beautiful design and in the perfect price range too.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Young

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst toaster I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst toaster I've ever seen. It only toast one side, there are no heating bars on the outside walls. No temperature adjusters. Surprised it had decent reviews because mine is horrible. I'm starting the question who actually writes the reviews. Is it consumers or employees???
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Read Carefully
customer_reviews.text: Please read the reviews on this product carefully before making a purchase. I did not and purchased this product because it was a Hamilton Beach like my old 16 year old toaster. Each and every complaint that someone has written here, I find to be true while using this product. It is now, as apparently are many others, in the trash. If I could give it zero starts I would. My husband has demanded a new toaster and this time I will pay careful attention to the reviews. Hamilton Beach whose corporate offices are in Virginia should be ashamed....very ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Blade

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an exact replacement for a Hamilton Beach toaster that died after many years. This one is "OK." It toasts evenly on each side, but one side is always darker than the other. And the first use in the morning is always darker than subsequent toasting. It's a decent toaster. Bagels fit fine. We were just hopeful for something better.
customer_reviews.author: LarryinIowa

customer_reviews.title: Lasted  6 months
customer_reviews.text: The toaster was great while it worked. Temperature control was a little iffy, but okay. The problem was we bought this on August 3, 2018 and on April 3, 2019 it stopped working. The lever to hold the toast down wouldn't stay down rendering the toaster useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E Gingras

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but does not toast evenly.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cute little stainless steel toaster for my newly remodeled farmhouse kitchen. A little disappointed that the inside coils do not toast as well as the outside ones....so the toast is unevenly toasted. Considering the toaster was only 20 bucks I let it go but was not happy. I downsized from a bulky 4 slice toaster so this size is much nicer and goes great with my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Art Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting - burnt on one side
customer_reviews.text: Toasting is uneven - burnt on one side, barely done on other. Observing the heating elements you can see that the ones to the outside are bright red and the element in the center is much dimmer hence less heat. Unfortunately I've had this for over a month so I'll probably keep it but I'm definitely not happy with the results
customer_reviews.author: Robert Doty

customer_reviews.title: just run it like 3-5 times on the highest settings in a well ...
customer_reviews.text: 8/10 even burning 7/10 speed has a metallic smell the first few times you run it; so, just run it like 3-5 times on the highest settings in a well ventilated area. edit: metallic smell comes back once in a while, would recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Chaos

customer_reviews.title: makes perfect toast
customer_reviews.text: toaster looks great, has a 'retro' feel like the one my mom had when i was growing up. i love that it has a dial for desired darkness or lightness of your toast. it takes 1 or 2 tries, but once you get it right it gives you perfect toast every time. i'm glad i spent a little more and got one that works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little toaster!  I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this toaster! Classic look, very practical functions, and a great price. You can lift the lever when retrieving your toast and it will rise a bit higher so your fingers don’t touch the hot opening. It feels like a quality build, so I am thrilled as long as it lasts. Should it fail me, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is cool to the touch but it only toasts one side of bread when in standard toasting mode. It does it for bagels which is nice but running the bread through twice to get toast is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy toaster and toadt is never done right Either underdone or too burnt
customer_reviews.author: stephanie e aiges

customer_reviews.title: ok toaster
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but even on the lowest setting it will burn the toast. I have to watch the toast and pop it manually. If I wait for the toaster to pop up the toast will be burnt. I would not recommend this toaster
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Family

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Stopped toasting on one side and burning the other side after just 3 weeks of use. Also, the lever is tricky to keep down. Total waste and very disappointing for a Hamilton Beach brand.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jessup

customer_reviews.title: I bought the exact type of toaster at a garage sale a few years ago and loved it. I decided to give my son the ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't use toaster much and just realized I missed a chance to return it. I bought the exact type of toaster at a garage sale a few years ago and loved it. I decided to give my son the old one and buy me a new one. The new one burns my toast no matter what setting I have it on. First 2 times I used it was fine but 3 times after that my toast was burnt and gave it to the birds. I tried each time to turn setting down to lighter and still burnt. Guess I need to find another brand to try for next new toaster
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much value for me. slow
customer_reviews.text: got to say I'm not impressed my Proctor Silex was a better toaster. Not sure why these newer toaster seem to take so long but just toaster takes two to three times longer to make toast later than the old toaster did. If you need something that's fast this is not the toaster. Also someone that designs it with the court coming out the side who has the toaster cord to the side it's a very poor design. Did not realize that when I bought it online. I wish you would show where the cord is it needs to come out the back of the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Doc832

customer_reviews.title: not so bad
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a something easy to use and cheap, and I'm overall fine with this toaster. The only problem is the toast cradle does not lift high enough to retrieve small things, like English muffins, requiring fishing these out. Also, the temperature is very high and I burned a lot of bread before finding the perfect regulation.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Not so good so far
customer_reviews.text: Have it on second to the lowest setting and almost burnt. Would have if I hadn't pressed the "eject" button. I'll see how it goes, and add to this review, or do a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Goldengirl

customer_reviews.title: It burns bread at lowest setting!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a piece of junk! Save your money! It has burned every piece of bread on the lowest setting. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: This toaster doesn't toast evenly.
customer_reviews.text: Not toasting evenly. You have to stand over the toaster, and turn the bread upside down to get a reasonable toast. I mean reasonable - not good. With four heat settings - they all seem to be the same. I am so disappointed - I chose it because it was a brand name, and was very disappointed. Don't choose this toaster. Spend a bit more for a good toaster. Don't be like me and have to buy two toasters.
customer_reviews.author: KatieBee

customer_reviews.title: Just got here and it works great so far
customer_reviews.text: It looks and works great . Our old toaster cost a few dollars less at walmart. It was trash. I like the features and looks of this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: R. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Good all around toaster
customer_reviews.text: Took a few trys to find the right setting for this toaster but now I have it down. The defroster worked well for a frozen waffel. Then toasted it perfect. It was the one with sugar and cinamon too. Looks nice in the kitchen, crumb tray easy to remove and empty. Not a bagel fan but it toasts them too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to control this toaster. No clear indicators on toast color. Toasts as if it is on permanent bagel setting. I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing this toaster. I just ordered a different one and I will be getting rid of this one !
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money you save
customer_reviews.text: I cheaped out and bought this toaster and wish I spent the extra $20 for a toaster that toasts a full slice of bread, not 3/4 piece of bread, and for a toaster where I can get and english muffin out without a fork. It's attractive and it does an ok just otherwise... But again, for $20 more you could probably be a lot less annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: VHReviews

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a chrome, retro looking toaster and this was as close as I could find, look wise it’s perfect. But regarding toasting performance it’s not consistent, toasts more on the sides facing the middle of the toaster than the sides facing the outside. But for now I’ll tolerate it, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Randy from Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Classic, iconic chrome toaster of the ages!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah this is exactly what I wanted and it works fine, and looks great! Classic chrome FTW!
customer_reviews.author: Milesman

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster and this is my second one. This time I will be more careful about slamming the plunger down because I think I wore the other one out doing that. My only gripe is I might want a long slice toaster instead but that doesn't detract from this one. This one is great
customer_reviews.author: hhilde

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect !! Great quality perfect size". I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Geisha Noa

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Makes good toast. Nice retro looking toaster. Don't be fooled. It only looks retro. It's got electronics inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach classic chrome two slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Owned this toaster before, for 3 yrs. when it died I found it on amazon and ordered it. It arrived well packed and on time. When opened and examined, it was very cheaply made and did not have a crumb tray as listed in the description and as my other one did, which is one reason I ordered it. I was very disappointed in the quality and construction. I returned it to amazon w/o any problems. I will definitely shop w/ amazon again but would not recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Not fancy but does everything I need it to do and takes up little room.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Lilli

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, having had the original
customer_reviews.text: Had the original model for many years and loved it, so when I had to replace it, I wanted the same. But this one unevenly toasts and doesn't have a crumb tray (how can that be?). And is very light in weight compared to the original. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should've kept looking.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty but burns my strudel no matter what setting except for defrost.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Center heating element dies after one year.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months but the center heating element failed overtime and barely works now.
customer_reviews.author: dbiers

customer_reviews.title: works great! Great price and better than expected quality
customer_reviews.text: works great! Great price and better than expected quality. Bought this model specifically for the safety of the Auto-Off feature.
customer_reviews.author: B INNES

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We had an old toaster that just toasted . This toaster is easy to use and clean. It toasted perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David Clay

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I am using this but the toaster part does not toast both sides equally. I purchased it because it was a Hamilton Beach will think twice when I buy the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Great toast!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very picky about the darkness on my toast and I can never seem to get it right on some toasters. This one was easy to navigate and I can make toast exactly as I want it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily for toast, pancakes, waffles, or hard rolls. Love the push button stop if you want to pop and check it. Easy settings.
customer_reviews.author: trbgiants

customer_reviews.title: Does not toast
customer_reviews.text: We have had this toaster for a week and it's absolutely the worst toaster I have ever owned. You have to put your bread in at least 5 times to get the bread toasted, worse for English Muffins. I would not recommend this toaster to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: It does its job,WELL!
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic, inexpensive toaster that reliably does what it is supposed to do. Toast. That's all I need!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey gumer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected - poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match one that a friend has had for six or seven years--which makes great toast. Upon opening the box I knew this was not the same quality as my friend's. Just tinny and rattley. It just wasn't up to snuff. I returned it. I will say it's slots were bug enough, for big bread slices and bagels.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful.. and works as described
customer_reviews.text: Love my toaster .. even although l would have liked it to be a little smaller it looks beautiful in my kitchen and it is lovely enough where l would give as an housewarming gift
customer_reviews.author: N L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So retro and does the job just fine. Great deal
customer_reviews.text: So retro and does the job just fine. Great deal. To the reviewer who said it gets hot.....didn't your mommy ever tell you not touch hot things?
customer_reviews.author: VJErwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, Good Toasr
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. We used it over the holidays and it works well. We both have had problems finding a toaster that does both sides at once. This one seems to be doing that so far. She likes the look of it, very retro.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Richards

customer_reviews.title: Lost its toasting power
customer_reviews.text: The toaster started off great. Gradually lost its toasting power over several weeks, so by second month would not toast correctly. Threw away.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good price, looks great and works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and looks great in my kitchen too!!️ Love the fact you can do bagels without getting them stuck. I would recommend it to friends especially all the toasters I saw in stores were twice as much and looked cheep.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie  A  Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster.
customer_reviews.text: This is the same toaster I bought years ago. Mine finally gave out so I bought the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toaster.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster replaced a GE toaster that is no longer being made. Exact toaster and looks nice with SS appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wag

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I almost didn't buy so glad I did works like a champ! Has all the best settings and the first piece of toast was so good! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Kary Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: Crumb tray is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Toaster works well. I do not like that the crumb tray has to be removed from the back, as it inevitably makes a mess moving the toaster to get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: good buy.
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is attractive asset to my kitchen. It only failed in one requirement---the pop-up bottom does not eject the toast high enough to retrieve it without discomfort. Otherwise, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda G. Salley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Tinny.
customer_reviews.text: This sounded great on the description page. The construction is very light. There is no side insulation. You can not touch the sides when it is on. You must toast whole grain bread two or more times on high. It has a cheap and tinny feel when handled. I would not recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: IRONWOOD

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Adjust easily.
customer_reviews.text: I love the chrome..it works great. what else would you want?
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Toasting of Bread.
customer_reviews.text: It seems there are heating elements that toast better on one side than the other. The intensity of the heat is not equal. This is true for both slots. But the toast seems ok. Update after several weeks: We are disappointed in the toaster's like of equal browning. We just purchased a similarly Black and Decker toaster and we like it much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dugger

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Wow my fanciest shiniest toaster ever... I am quite impressed considering how little I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Buddha Child

customer_reviews.title: Classic Look
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. Replaced my old GE toaster that died. Classic old school chrome look.
customer_reviews.author: William E

customer_reviews.title: Does not toast evenly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the older one I had. Material is cheaper and does not toast even on both sides, one side is good and the other is burnt. Older version was great. Will need to buy a different toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Keniry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't push the English muffins up high enough. Have ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't push the English muffins up high enough. Have to unlplug it, and fish them out with a knife. Pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Wide bread doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: The toaster functions fine. But we like to buy the wide, multigrain breads and they don't fit in the slots. We have to force them to go down for toasting.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Worst
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a -10. Barely toasts... For the first week. Then the radiants never get red. POS... Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Does not toast evenly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very slow toaster, plus 1 side of the toast will be fine while the other slice of the bread is dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: BOB CADDELL

customer_reviews.title: Broke after aproxiamately 20 toasts
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but is poorly made. The levers that push the toast up and down disengaged and no longer go up or down. This is after about of week of operation! I can't believe it is so hard to find a toaster these days. My Grandma has this same toaster and hers still works. Perhaps they made some short cuts with the more recent models. It was a very big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Im throwing this in the garbage and getting something else
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in October of 2016. About 6 months ago it started losing its toasting ability. Now I need to puhs the bread down twice on each side. Im throwing this in the garbage and getting something else..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far 😊
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had a funny smell when we first used it but it’s gone now.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Manuel Novales

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.  But doesn't toast well at all. 😣
customer_reviews.text: This is so disappointing. The look is perfect But It takes this toaster 3 times to toast on high to even get it light brown toast. 😞Something is not rite with this toaster. I noticed some of the coils inside do not glow
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: attractive and operates beautifully. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a toaster on sale that lasted about a week. This one is made well, attractive and operates beautifully. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Outstander

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but dangerous, gets too hot in the outsidr.
customer_reviews.author: dpp

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster! What more is there to say... It toasts our toast. Easy to use and has a nicer appearance than some others.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Was a Christmas gift to a family member
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. It only toasts one side of the bread
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. It only toasts one side of the bread, no, I don't have it on the bagel setting.
customer_reviews.author: Lorieckl

customer_reviews.title: if you like burnt toast
customer_reviews.text: Not as tall as my old one of the same model. However, works as it should. PS, if you like burnt toast, two time through gets it crispy, the third time it is black charcoal. Slather with butter and it is heaven.
customer_reviews.author: John S Hansmann

customer_reviews.title: It looks great! It fits bagels and wide bread
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! It fits bagels and wide bread. The toast settings work as expected. It cleans up with a wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old unnamed toaster that burned out. This unit workes as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Little Al

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the way that it toasts
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the way that it toasts. The coils on the outside get hotter than those on the inside, so when you get it right on one side, the other side is hardly toasted. /dick h
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a housewarming gift for a friend who bought his first home. It came right on time, and he said that he's really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: amybeth7

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy
customer_reviews.text: Any toaster that always centers your bread, no matter the thickness, is a good toaster (because toast on one side and charcoal on the other sucks)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too shallow
customer_reviews.text: Good basic toaster.. Variety of settings but not deep enough even for standard sizes bread.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: We've had Hamilton Beach in the past but I'm disappointed with this one
customer_reviews.text: We've had Hamilton Beach in the past but I'm disappointed with this one. It's cools sides yes, but the buttons seem flimsy to me. The defrost/bagel buttons don't seem stable enough to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Gerhauser

customer_reviews.title: It makes toast
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a pop tart, a bagel and a slice of bread. But so far it's done it's job and heats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heasley

customer_reviews.title: Toasty
customer_reviews.text: Not expensive yet it makes the very best toast ever! It actually toasts, takes a moment longer than some, but worth the wait. Many settings and bagels fit easily. My favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Toasts bread unevenly. Inside elements put out twice the ...
customer_reviews.text: Toasts bread unevenly. Inside elements put out twice the heat as out side elements on each side. One side done, one side untoasted. For get this toaster....
customer_reviews.author: Silvertip

customer_reviews.title: works as needed
customer_reviews.text: a little flimsy plastic but for the price and "features" i think it is good...its just a toaster afterall....
customer_reviews.author: ReviewDoc

customer_reviews.title: NICE  TOASTER
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money came quickly would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: EILEENO'REILLY

customer_reviews.title: Looks good! Works not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Toast was uneven. Light on one side & dark on the other. Packaging looked pre used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't brown toast evenly one side is always darker then other
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Seymour

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Classic Chrome 2 Slice Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Bagel and Defrost Settings, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, (22790)
product_meta.description: Size:2 SliceHamilton Beach 2 slice toasters are popular not only for their Expert toasting performance-they also look great in your kitchen. Wider slots and smart buttons allow you to uniformly toast and warm bagels, English muffins and other breads, and advanced toasting technology ensures consistent results with each use.
feature_bullets: Lifts slices higher with toast boost
2 slice toaster has large slots to easily fit bagels and thick slices of artisanal bread, in addition to smaller favorites like English muffins and frozen waffles
